name: Forsaken AR: Darkest Delivery
summary: Forsaken AR is the result of hard work across the entire FNaF AR modding community as a whole! This fanmade version of FNaF AR contains a fully custom server, along with numerous modifications to create a seamless extension to the original game, introducing new characters, skins, devices, and more. Some notable features include the addition of Lefty, Endo-02, Trash and the Gang and more to the game, as well as brand new events with unique skins and rewards, and a new Random Lure that brings a completely random animatronic to your door! The game includes many quality-of-life enhancements, such as more XP for harder CPUs, self-sending, coins from salvages, unlocking icons from encounters, and more!

videos.name: Trash and the Gang | Reveal Trailer
videos.title: Come a little closer..
